mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.uuid, m.name, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.upload_date, b.category from board b left join member m on b.uuid = m.uuid order by b.category= "공지사항" desc, b.board_id;
select b.board_id, b.uuid, m.name, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.upload_date, b.category from board b left join member m on b.uuid = m.uuid where b.board_id = #{board_id};
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where board_id = #{board_id};
update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, upload_date = now() where board_id = #{board_id}
